name: BalloonBilly
description:
Collect ballons to get higher!

Avoid enemies and projectiles and get to the finish!

Balloons act as life, lose them all you fall.

Once collected blue ballon you can slow down to avoid enemies and projectiles more easy.

Made together with  by 

Art - Me;  Sound - Pooky, Programming -  NicolasVdk; Designer -  ZP
